name: Angry Monster Game
description:
Tons of levels, thousands of fun filled level to keep you entertained.
Exploding special items in every level.
Free powerups every day from the Bonus Wheel.
The game is full of beautiful effects and fully optimized features.
1000's of Carefully created and tested levels will keep your players engaged by it’s variety of targets such as
 blocks target collection
 special blocks collection, gates, bubbles, balls.
 other combinations

Levels gradually become harder and will progressively unlock 5 beautiful boosters that will totally transform the gameplay.

Beautiful Gameplay.
Easy to play but hard to master.
Match-2 or more blocks of the same color in order to complete the Level.
Count your moves carefully and avoid the endless challenges that occur on your journey.
